'''Hurwyna''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

One of the many patrons enjoying the adra-infused waters of the bathhouse. Hurwyna came from Dyrwood to the Deadfire to find a cure for her infertility problem. The luminous adra baths taken under [Seinu](/seinu/)'s guidance are claimed to be a way to help with that problem.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * The Watcher can wish her luck with her treatment, or offer an opinion on the subject.
** Good luck with that [[Benevolent](/benevolent/)]
** [Metaphysics](/metaphysics/) 3 / [Mystic](/mystic/): "I don't think that's a guaranteed result." [[Clever](/clever/)]
** That will never work [[Rational](/rational/)]
}}
[Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/)

==Background==
One of the many patrons enjoying the adra-infused waters of the bathhouse. Hurwyna came from Dyrwood to the Deadfire to find a cure for her infertility problem. The luminous adra baths taken under [[Seinu]]'s guidance are claimed to be a way to help with that problem.
